name: Journey of the Jar [HTML]
description:
Journey of the Jar

An old man named Edward Sucro tells you about his past adventure, but he can't remember every single detail. He needs your help to piece together the story and reach the good ending.  However, be aware that there are 5 possible bad endings.  Good luck! 

---

This is my first attempt at making a game (if you can even call it that). I decided to start off with a basic text-based game. I hope you enjoy, and please, leave suggestions or comments below. They will really help!
